package vech;

public class test {
public static void main(String[] args) {
	Ivehicl  c=new Car();
	c.drive();
	c.turnLeft();
	c.brake();
	Ivehicl  t=new Train();
	t.drive();
	t.turnLeft();
	t.brake();
	IpublicTra i=new Train();
	i.getNumberOfpep();
	
}
}
package vech;

public class Train implements Ivehicl, IpublicTra{

	@Override
	public void drive() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("The train is turning left etc");
		
	}

	@Override
	public void turnLeft() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("The train is turning left etc");
	}

	@Override
	public void brake() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("The train is turning left etc");
	}

	@Override
	public void getNumberOfpep() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("The train is turning left etc");
	}

}
package vech;

public class Car extends MotorisedVechicle implements Ivehicl {

	@Override
	public void drive() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("the car is in the brake mode etc");
		
	}

	@Override
	public void turnLeft() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("the car is in the brake mode etc");
	}

	@Override
	public void brake() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("the car is in the brake mode etc");
	}
	

}

package vech;

public class MotorisedVechicle {

	
	void checkMotor(){
		System.out.println("the motor of  the vechicle is in good condition");
	}

}
package vech;

public interface Ivehicl {
	void drive();
	void turnLeft();
	void brake();

}
package vech;

public interface IpublicTra {
void getNumberOfpep();
}
